pageContext.geocode_address: 8236 Southeast 24th Street, Mercer Island, WA 98040, USA
pageContext.public_note: Full Day Option Available with Intro to STEM, Space limited! Only Students in both classes will be supervised over lunch, no food provided by Play-Well. Please sign up for both classes and put a FULL DAY note in the note section!
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Mine, craft, and build the Star Wars universe using LEGO® bricks! Roll the dice to gather Jedi resources. Then build a Pod Racer, craft a Droid, or create the Treehouse Village of Endor! This novice Play-Well game is inspired by the Minecraft tablet game and the Star Wars fantasy setting.
pageContext.course_type_name: JediCraft Adventure Game with LEGO® Materials
pageContext.email_registration_description: If you have questions about this camp, contact our Area Manager, Emily Kahler: emily@play-well.org or 520-548-1003
